name: Ninja Runners -هجوم النينجا
description:
These little cute Ninjas are no innocent! they will drive you nuts! Slash them with your stars, prevent them from crossing to the end line, many Ninjas with hidden secret abilities are waiting for you to defeat. Collect coins along the way, buy more lives and upgrade your stars to more powerful Red and Black Stars! Compare your score to your friends on leaderboard; kill more ninjas to achieve your belt status all the way from white belt up to the black belt.
Like us on Facebook to have FB token to redeem for coins inside the game

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Ninja-Runners/1449146068699796?ref=hl
